trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" />.
trans-unit.target: 为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow" /> 事件提供数据。

trans-unit.source: To cancel the deletion of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow> event handler, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要取消中某一行的删除<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.UserDeletingRow>事件处理程序中，设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。

trans-unit.source: The row the user is deleting.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the `dataGridViewRow` parameter value to initialize the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用`dataGridViewRow`要初始化值的参数值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowCancelEventArgs.Row%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the row that the user is deleting.
The row that the user deleted.
The following code example illustrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此类型。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中实现虚拟模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。
